message.raw:
Added a customramp method to analoout functions, that takes a function and
arguments that should be passed to it. Any function can be passes in that
takes relative time since the start of the ramp as the first parameter,
the ramp duration as the second parameter, and any other parameters and keyword
arguments. With the exception of 'units', as that keyword argument will be used
by labscript and not passed on to the function.
